data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Lin, Chen, Xiang-Sheng, Li, Zi-Zhong (2013): Review of the bamboo-feeding species of genus Scaphoideus (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) from China, with description of one new species. Zootaxa 3619 (5): 557-568, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3619.5.5
